price: 私は我が主*のお言伝をあなた方に伝える。私は、あなた方への誠実なる忠告者なのだ。
arabic: أُبَلِّغُكُمۡ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّي وَأَنَا۠ لَكُمۡ نَاصِحٌ أَمِينٌ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: uballighukum risālāti rabbī wa-anā lakum nāṣiḥun amīnun
